name: KidneyHealth_EstimatedGlomerularFiltrationRateLabTestHDLOINC
title: Kidney Health_Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate Lab Test HD LOINC
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Kidney Health Screening For Diabetes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Kidney Health Screening For Diabetes for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath),(Data Element Scope: Kidney Health Screening For Diabetes care need for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate Lab Test LOINC Codes that constitute the Kidney Health Screening For Diabetes care need for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
